medications.name: Methadone
medications.treatment: Start day 1, feel mild discomfort for 7 days, then feel normal
medications.refill: Go to a clinic every day to take liquid medication by mouth. Once you are stable for 3 months, you can take medication at home every week
medications.discomfort: Very effective at improving cravings and withdrawal symptoms 5/5; improve mood
medications.improvement: Improve relationship, increased chance of working, decreased chance of legal problems
medications.side-effects: For every 12 people: 3 have Sleepiness; 8 have Weight gain; 6 have Constipation; 6 have Sexual Effects in men over age 40

changes.refill: Pick up every day from clinic
Get weekly amount to take home

medications.name: Buprenorphine Sublingual
medications.treatment: Stop using 1-2 days, feel moderate withdrawal symptoms, start treatment med, feel 5 days mild discomfort, then feel normal
medications.refill: Go to a clinic, you can pick up medications every week for 1 month, then every month, and take them every day at home
medications.discomfort: Very effective at improving cravings and withdrawal symptoms 5/5; improve mood
medications.improvement: Improve relationship, increased chance of working, decreased chance of legal problems
medications.side-effects: Headaches (for 4 people out of 12); Sleep Changes (for 2 people out of 12)

changes.refill: Pick up every week from pharmacy
Pick up every month from pharmacy

medications.name: Naltrexone Injectable
medications.treatment: Stop using 7 days, with some meds to help, then start treatment medication orally for 3 days, then receive injection. Feel normal after 4-6 weeks
medications.refill: Go to a clinic once a month to get an injection in muscle
medications.discomfort: Has small effect on improving cravings and withdrawal symptoms 1/5
medications.improvement: Improve relationship, increased chance of working, decreased chance of legal problems
medications.side-effects: Irritation at medication site (for 8 people in 12)

medications.name: Continue to Use
medications.treatment: Stop using 1-2 days, feel moderate withdrawal symptoms, start treatment med, feel 5 days mild discomfort, then feel normal
medications.refill: Go to a clinic, you can pick up medications every week for 1 month, then every month, and take them every day at home
medications.improvement: Improve relationship, increased chance of working, decreased chance of legal problems
medications.side-effects: Headaches (for 4 people out of 12); Sleep Changes (for 2 people out of 12)

changes.refill: Pick up every week from pharmacy
Pick up every month from pharmacy

medications.name: No medicine
medications.refill: Need to obtain opioid drug daily or multiple times a day
medications.discomfort: Cravings 5/5 unless you can find more opioid drug
medications.improvement: Problems with relationships, difficulty with employment, increased risk of legal problems
medications.side-effects: Sleepiness (3 people in 12); Weight gain (8 people in 12); Constipation (6 people in 12); Sexual Effects (6 in 12 men over age 40); if injecting, irritation or infection at site of injection
